definition: on top/upon/above/upper/previous/first (of multiple parts)/to climb/to get onto/to go up/to attend (class or university)

sentences.english: Blue jeans and a yellow T-shirt.
She wore a sexy see-through blouse to the cocktail party.
sentences.chinese: 她穿一件性感透明的上衣去參加雞尾酒會。

sentences.english: An exquisite flower adorned her dress.
sentences.chinese: 她的上衣上別一枚別緻的胸花做爲點綴。

sentences.english: B:I took off my shirt and my watch and jumped into the water.
sentences.chinese: 我脫掉上衣，解下手錶，跳進水裏。

sentences.english: When worn, the utility model can eliminate odors, and thus is suitable for people who have osmidrosis.
sentences.chinese: 本上衣穿在身上能除異味，特別有腋臭的人更受歡迎。

sentences.english: A button has come off my coat.
sentences.chinese: 我的上衣掉了一個釦子。

sentences.english: And she started dyeing her stockings and blouses there too.
sentences.chinese: 同時在宿舍裏邊，她開始用顏料染着襪子和上衣。

sentences.english: The little old lady pulls off her knickers and lifts up her dress.
sentences.chinese: 只見小老太太脫下短褲，撩起上衣。

sentences.english: Our team wore red and white shirts, white shorts and red stockings.
sentences.chinese: 我們隊身穿紅白上衣，白色短褲和紅色長襪。

sentences.english: I'm just wearing this coat out so that I can have a new one sooner.
sentences.chinese: 我正儘快把這件舊上衣穿夠本，以便早一點換件新的。

sentences.english: The seamstress bound the hem of the dress with a ruffle.
sentences.chinese: 女裁縫用褶襉飾邊給女上衣鑲邊。

sentences.english: For ladies you will find jeans, tops, dresses, undergarments and fragrances.
sentences.chinese: 對於女人你會發現牛仔褲，上衣，服裝，內衣和香水。

sentences.english: Was that girl wearing no blouse or was it a figment of my imagination?
sentences.chinese: 是那姑娘沒穿上衣呢，還是我憑空想象的事？

sentences.english: Shoot! My coat is caught in the door.
The boy in a light blue coat is my brother.
sentences.chinese: 穿淺藍上衣的那男孩是我弟弟。
